title: 旧约 - 以西结书(Ezekiel) - 第 15 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 以西结书(Ezekiel) -- 第 15 章 ( 本篇共有 48 章 )

lineList.en: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
Son of man, What is the vine tree more than any tree, or than a branch which is among the trees of the forest?
lineList.cn: 人子阿，葡萄树比别样树有什么强处。葡萄枝比众树枝有什么好处。

lineList.en: Shall wood be taken thereof to do any work? or will men take a pin of it to hang any vessel thereon?
lineList.cn: 其上可以取木料作什么工用，可以取来作钉子挂什么器皿吗。

lineList.en: Behold, it is cast into the fire for fuel; the fire devoureth both the ends of it, and the midst of it is burned. Is it meet for any work?
lineList.cn: 看哪，已经抛在火中当作柴烧，火既烧了两头，中间也被烧了，还有益于工用吗。

lineList.en: Behold, when it was whole, it was meet for no work: how much less shall it be meet yet for any work, when the fire hath devoured it, and it is burned?
lineList.cn: 完全的时候尚且不合乎什么工用，何况被火烧坏，还能合乎什么工用吗。

lineList.en: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; As the vine tree among the trees of the forest, which I have given to the fire for fuel, so will I give the inhabitants of Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 所以，主耶和华如此说，众树以内的葡萄树，我怎样使它在火中当柴，也必照样待耶路撒冷的居民。

lineList.en: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the LORD, when I set my face against them.
lineList.cn: 我必向他们变脸。他们虽从火中出来，火却要烧灭他们。我向他们变脸的时候，你们就知道我是耶和华。

lineList.en: And I will make the land desolate, because they have committed a trespass, saith the Lord GOD.
lineList.cn: 我必使地土荒凉，因为他们行事干犯我。这是主耶和华说的。
